name: Noona
greetingText: Finally the day is here, yayy!!
wishText: I hope you always stay smiley, and cute too ;)
textInChatBox: Happiest Birthday Love! Yeee! Many Many Happy Retu blah...
text2: Tbh that's what I was going to do.
text4: And I realised, I wanted to do something...
outroText: Wishing you get everything you deserve, and desire! Stay blessed. With Love - Kaushal <3
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again. (Atleast 3 baar dekhna, mehnat lagi hai)
